entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:14 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 10:35 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: SSE 30 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
